body: That's an actually interesting and realistic hypnosis mechanic. He gained instant trust and removed her inhibitions, but still had to manipulate the girl from then on. Extra scary when you realize that there are drugs out there who do that as well, although the side effects may raise concern on the victims' side.
I mean its her own fault for asking a guy to hook her up with his friend though

Ok I'm looking for a doujin set in medieval times where a woman in the royal family has been captured and her cousin/brother has being held hostage and told she must fight in the colosseum in order to save him plus she's also told she has a curse on her that turns her into a slut, any help?
Well, fortunately I don't have friends like him... it was interesting.
